name: Spike roller
description: Shoots a spiked ball in a fixed straight line which goes through many enemies

name: Big spiked ball
description: Shoots a bigger spiked ball which does more damage

name: Heavy spiked ball
description: Spiked ball does more damage, pierce, and slight knockback

name: Steam roller
description: Slightly more pierce, much more knockback

name: Glue roller
description: Glue keeps enemies slower. Also more pierce, damage, and knockback

name: Small spiked ball
description: Shoots smaller spiked balls but much faster

name: Gold rocket gun
description: Shoots better rockets, and 3 at different angles

name: Electric spikes
description: Spiked balls have increased pierce, and slightly better fire rate / damage

name: Plasma ball
description: Shoots balls of plasma instead of spiked balls, with even better pierce

name: Laser turret
description: Instead of a spiked ball, shoots a laser beam with infinite pierce

name: Giant flashlight
description: Giant flashlight apparently deals more damage, also the beam gets wider the further away
